name: Spore Invaders (Zirki)
description:
Alien Spores are invading! Destroy them all! Build your multiplier and unlock ultimate firepower!

This is a small demo game, based on the 2D Shooter tutorial from Construct 3.

Controls : 

Mobile:

Move Player: Left Joystick - Aim Player: Right Joystick

PC:

Move Player: WASD / Arrows - Aim Player: Mouse -  Shoot: Click / Hold

Audio from Construct Demo Space Blast
